gov.lbl.glamm.server.dao.impl
Class ExperimentDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
  gov.lbl.glamm.server.dao.impl.ExperimentDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExperimentDAO
public class ExperimentDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExperimentDAO

Implementation of the Experiment DAO interface. This implementation allows aggregate access to the Microarray DAO implementation (for accessing microarray data from MicrobesOnline) and the session DAO implementation (for accessing objects uploaded by the user during a session.)

Author:
jtbates
